verses.verse: By the rivers <S%H5104><s%> of Babylon <S%H894><s%>, there we sat down <S%H3427><s%> <S%H8804><s%>, yea, we wept <S%H1058><s%> <S%H8804><s%>, when we remembered <S%H2142><s%> <S%H8800><s%> TZiyon <S%H6726><s%>.
We hanged <S%H8518><s%> <S%H8804><s%> our harps <S%H3658><s%> upon the willows <S%H6155><s%> in the midst <S%H8432><s%> thereof.

For there they that carried us away captive <S%H7617><s%> <S%H8802><s%> required <S%H7592><s%> <S%H8804><s%> of us a song <S%H1697><s%> <S%H7892><s%>; and they that wasted <S%H8437><s%> us required of us mirth <S%H8057><s%>, saying, Sing <S%H7891><s%> <S%H8798><s%> us one of the songs <S%H7892><s%> of TZiyon <S%H6726><s%>.
How shall we sing <S%H7891><s%> <S%H8799><s%> the YY'S <S%H3068><s%> song <S%H7892><s%> in a strange <S%H5236><s%> land <S%H127><s%> ?
If I forget <S%H7911><s%> <S%H8799><s%> thee, O Yerushalayim <S%H3389><s%>, let my right hand <S%H3225><s%> forget <S%H7911><s%> <S%H8799><s%> her cunning.

If I do not remember <S%H2142><s%> <S%H8799><s%> thee, let my tongue <S%H3956><s%> cleave <S%H1692><s%> <S%H8799><s%> to the roof of my mouth <S%H2441><s%>; if I prefer <S%H5927><s%> <S%H8686><s%> not Yerushalayim <S%H3389><s%> above my chief <S%H7218><s%> joy <S%H8057><s%>.

Remember <S%H2142><s%> <S%H8798><s%>, O YY <S%H3068><s%>, the children <S%H1121><s%> of Edom <S%H123><s%> in the day <S%H3117><s%> of Yerushalayim <S%H3389><s%>; who said <S%H559><s%> <S%H8802><s%>, Rase <S%H6168><s%> <S%H8761><s%> it, rase <S%H6168><s%> <S%H8761><s%> it, even to the foundation <S%H3247><s%> thereof.

O daughter <S%H1323><s%> of Babylon <S%H894><s%>, who art to be destroyed <S%H7703><s%> <S%H8803><s%>; happy <S%H835><s%> shall he be, that rewardeth <S%H7999><s%> <S%H8762><s%> thee as thou hast served <S%H1580><s%> <S%H8804><s%> <S%H1576><s%> us.
Happy <S%H835><s%> shall he be, that taketh <S%H270><s%> <S%H8799><s%> and dasheth <S%H5310><s%> <S%H8765><s%> thy little ones <S%H5768><s%> against the stones <S%H5553><s%>.
